ses.content:
From: john.doe@ever.ag
To: brieitagent@ever.ag
Subject: Computer won't start

From: john.doe@ever.ag
Subject: Computer won't start

My computer won't turn on this morning. I pressed the power button but nothing happens. The power light doesn't come on and I don't hear any fans. I tried unplugging it and plugging it back in but still nothing. I have an important presentation today and need help urgently.

Please help!

John Doe
Sales Department
